creator: skip card game
descriptionHtml:
This quick shortcut maker could help us quick launch some common features by create short cut keys, Like:
Adjusts the volume;
Locks screen;
Turns on/off the flashlight;
Checks the app info in your smartphone;
One-touch dialing;
Put the contact information of common contacts directly on the desktop. You can even set up a wall of common contacts with dialing function. Try it now；
and more and more shortcuts for common features are coming soon...

Benefits:
This app can reduce the loss of the physical buttons(the volume buttons、the power button) and extend the service life of the button.
Once the physical buttons are not working well, this app will be a perfect substitute.

By this APP, you can :
1. Create a shortcut key to adjusts the volume .
2. Create a shortcut key to locks screen .
3. Create a shortcut key to turns on/off the flashlight .
4. Create a shortcut key to quick launch and checks the app info in your smartphone .
[ You can quick launch any app info installed in your smartphone. This feature is a great tool and useful to developers, because they had to check the app info step by step, from the home page, and then setting and next... maybe 10 seconds later then they get the app info. So it's boring. Now , they just need tap the short cut key in the homepage , then get the app info immediately]

Notes:
This app requires Device Admin privileges to implement the "Screen off and lock" feature.
descriptionShort: This quick shortcut maker APP could quick launch short cuts for some features.

descriptionShort: This quick shortcut maker could create shortcuts for your google play apps
title: Quick Shortcut Maker

creator: skip card game
descriptionHtml:
This app can create a shortcut on android homescreen for anything you want from your android.

🟡 This quick shortcut maker could help us quick launch some common features by create short cut keys, Like:
1. Search and launch the app which you want.
2. Adjusts the volume;
3. Locks screen;
4. Turns on/off the flashlight; The flash light shortcut uses the flash located on the back of your Android device to bring you the first light wherever you go.
5. Checks the app info in your smartphone;
6. One-touch dialing;
7. Activities: Create shortcut of installed apps and activities.
Put the contact information of common contacts directly on the desktop. You can even set up a wall of common contacts with dialing function. Try it now；

🟢 You can also use the QuickShortcutMaker for searching the app which you want to launch.
If you want to use the app which you don't use frequently, maybe you have no shortcuts for it. So, you may have to search the app from a list of many apps. Even if you know the name of the app, it's hard to find it.
In this situation, the QuickShortcutMaker will help you finding the app. Please try!

🔦 Special and useful functions——Flashlight:
Flashlight free turns your phone into a little torchlight to carry around in the dark. By default, the flash LED light turns on automatically when you quickly launch the app, and the brightest flash helps you see everything clearly in the dark. Even if you leave the app, light will still light your device's flash.

Flashlight has a simple design and is easy to use for the first time. The app automatically turns on the LED light on first launch, and you can turn it on and off as quickly as a real flash .

🔵 APP EXPLORER:
Here you will get a list of installed apps in your device. You can filter the list by All apps, System apps or User (downloaded) apps.

By tapping on the App, a context menu appears that will let you launch the target, add a shortcut for this target to the home screen for easy access.

🟤 Benefits:
This app can reduce the loss of the physical buttons(the volume buttons、the power button) and extend the service life of the button.
Once the physical buttons are not working well, this app will be a perfect substitute.

🌏 By this APP, you can :
1. Create a shortcut key to adjusts the volume .
2. Create a shortcut key to locks screen .
3. Create a shortcut key to turns on/off the flashlight . Camera LED Flash - Use your phone camera flash to emit bright light.
4. Create a shortcut key to quick launch an App.
5. Create a shortcut key to checks the app info in your smartphone .
6. You can also use this app to launch an activity from installed app.
[ You can quick launch any app info installed in your smartphone. This feature is a great tool and useful to developers, because they had to check the app info step by step, from the home page, and then setting and next... maybe 10 seconds later then they get the app info. So it's boring. Now , they just need tap the short cut key in the homepage , then get the app info immediately]

🟠 Tile Customization
1. Use the real app icon for the icon in the notification panel
2. Choose your own icons
3. Name the Tile whatever you want

🟣 Notes:
This app requires Device Admin privileges to implement the "Screen off and lock" feature.

More and more shortcuts for common features are coming soon...
